thread.title: Manchester City 2-1 Swansea player ratings: Gabriel Jesus double sends Pep Guardiola's men to late victory
thread.title_full: Manchester City 2-1 Swansea player ratings: Gabriel Jesus double sends Pep Guardiola's men to late victory

author: Andy Dunn
title: Manchester City 2-1 Swansea player ratings: Gabriel Jesus double sends Pep Guardiola's men to late victory
text:
Just about gets benefit of the doubt for goal. Just 
Stones 6 
Half-hearted with attempted block on Sigurdsson strike 
Kolarov 5 
Control continues to let him down, sloppy moments 
Fernandinho 6 
Clearly a Pep favourite but occasionally off the pace Fernandinho celebrates with his compatriot Jesus (Photo: Getty Images) 
Toure 6 
Went close from a set-piece but in major impact 
Clichy 5 
Weak defending in the build-up to the Swansea equaliser 
Sterling 6 
Booked. Just lacking the right final pass and harshly penalised for diving 
De Bruyne 6 
Booked. Drifted into great positions, snatched at a couple of chances Leroy Sane impressed yet again for City (Photo: REUTERS) 
Silva 7 
String-puller supreme, ran the attacking operation 
Sane 7 
Gives natural width and is growing into the jersey 
Jesus 8 MOTM 
Right time, right place, right signing. Exciting 
Subs 
Zabaleta (De Bruyne 78mins) 6 
Aguero (Sterling 83mins) 6 Jesus hits home the opening goal for City (Photo: Getty Images) Swansea City 
Faultless for goal, clean work for the most part 
Naughton 6 
Given a stern test by Sane, passed with a B mark 
Fernandez 5 
A torrid time early, Silva, in particular, giving him the runaround 
Mawson 6 
Shaky start, steadier as game wore on 
Olsson 7 
Enjoyed a decent battle with Sterling and acquitted himself well 
Routledge 5 
Restricted mainly to defensive duties and felt the pace Swansea had levelled he game through Sigurdsson (Photo: REUTERS) 
Fer 6 
Booked. Game based him by in first half, better after break 
Cork 7 
Put in a major shift, played a captain’s role 
Carroll 6 
Odd moment of threat but a hard afternoon’s chasing, in the main 
Sigurdsson 7 
Unlucky with a free-kick, great strike for goal. Class 
Llorente 5 
Booked. A thankless task which he stuck to manfully 
Subs
